post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
I am looking for CVS Administrator for my client in Toronto , ON for 13 months contract. If you are interested and available, then please send me your resume along with your Rate/Salary.


CVS Admin - 13 months

Start date requested 06/01/2010

End date requested 07/31/2011

Work location: Toronto, ON

  

Job Description:

Build and deploy knowledge and capability for Broker and Java files from CVS Build and deploy of BAR files from central repository for BODS.



Required Skills:
·          CVS

·          Version Control Software.

·          Manage Software Changes using CVS.



Revana



Thanks & Regards,

Revana Tarapur | Mentor Tech>Source Inc. | Recruitment

100 AllState Pkwy, Suite 803

Markham, Ontario , L3R 6H3

post.title: CVS Administrator
